title: Add Lead Contact Info field to outreach entry create/edit and display

requirements.summary: Add a persisted “Lead Contact Info” text field to outreach entries in the UI (create/edit + visible display).
acceptanceCriteria: Frontend: the Add/Edit Entry form includes a labeled text input "Lead Contact Info" that is saved when creating an entry and is pre-filled when editing an existing entry.

Frontend: after saving, the Dashboard refreshes via existing React Query invalidation and the saved "Lead Contact Info" value is visible somewhere in the entry UI (either a table column, a row detail/expanded view, or an edit view that clearly shows the persisted value).

file_operations.description: Add a new form field (react-hook-form) for "Lead Contact Info" and wire it into create/update payloads: include it in FormData, reset defaults, pre-fill from editingEntry.leadContactInfo, and submit it along with the existing fields. Use existing shadcn-ui Input/Label for the new control; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Extend create/update entry mutations to accept leadContactInfo and pass it to the backend createEntry/updateEntry calls in the correct argument order (matching frontend/src/backend.d.ts). Ensure existing React Query invalidation behavior remains unchanged.

Display the persisted leadContactInfo value in the entries UI (e.g., add a "Lead Contact Info" column with a readable/truncated cell). Use existing shadcn-ui Table primitives already in this file; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
